original: Jungerfelt, Gustaf Georg, telegraf-kommrsisarie, Uddevalla, f. 13/111/97 i Ör, Älvsb. 1. G. 22 m. Elsa Nilsén. Barn: Birgit f. 23, Kerstin 26, Bengt 31. — Majornas lärov. i Gbg 15, te-legr:kurs 16, högre dito 36. E. o. telegr :as’sist. i Gbg 16-18, ord. där 19-33, telegr :komm :ie i Ånge 34-36, i Ronneiby 37, i Falköp. 37-47, i Uddevall|a sed. 47. Led. av styr. f. Sv. telegr :tj :männens: fören. andra krets sed. 45, led. av -stiadsfullm. i Falkiöp. 44-47, av kyrkofullm. 43-46, av drätsielkamm. 41-47, av lönend 43-47 o. av trafik-ndn 43-47. Hobbies: friluftsliv, fotografering.
translated: Jungerfelt, Gustaf Georg, telegraph commissionaire, Uddevalla, b. 13/11/1897 in Ör, Älvsborg. Married on 22/xx/xxxx to Elsa Nilsén. Children: Birgit b. 1923, Kerstin b. 1926, Bengt b. 1931. Educated at Majornas lärov in Gothenburg in 1915, completed telegraph education in 1916, advanced telegraph education in 1936. Was a deputy telegraph assistant in Gothenburg from 1916-1918, and an ordinary telegraph employee there from 1919-1933. Worked as a telegraph commissionaire in Ånge from 1934-1936, in Ronneby in 1937, in Falköping from 1937-1947, and in Uddevalla since 1947. Member of the board for the Swedish Telegraph Workers' Association since 1945, member of the city council in Falköping from 1944-1947, member of the church council from 1943-1946, member of the financial committee from 1941-1947, member of the employee association from 1943-1947, and member of the traffic commission from 1943-1947. Hobbies include outdoor activities and photography.
